/* HqSplyPriceHistoryMapper.getHqSplyPriceHistoryList */
SELECT thpsuh.HQ_OFFICE_CD , thpsuh.PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(thpsuh.PROC_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS PROC_DT , thpsuh.PROC_FG , thpsuh.B_SPLY_UPRC , thpsuh.A_SPLY_UPRC , thpsuh.MOD_ID
FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SPLY_UPRC_HIST thpsuh , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp WHERE thpsuh.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpsuh.PROC_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999'
AND thp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND thpsuh.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND thp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thpsuh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD = thpsuh.PROD_CD ORDER BY thpsuh.PROD_CD, thpsuh.PROC_DT
